links.description: Winnebago - The recreational vehicle maker reported adjusted quarterly profit of 62 cents per share, 1 cent a share below estimates. Revenue beat forecasts, however, and the company said it saw an increase in sales growth, market share, and profit margin during the quarter.

links.title: Facebook Is Getting The Attention But You Should Be Watching The Fed
links.description: Facebook is still center stage, and it is likely to remain that way. The good news, the stock found a bounce today, around $162.50. But do not be fooled the stock is still problematic because it is hard to predict what comes next.

messages.body: $AAPL The tech giant continues to build its self-driving test fleet. https://stocknews.com/news/aapl-apple-inc-aapl-remains-aggressive-in-self-driving-vehicle-race-to/

links.title: Apple Inc. (AAPL) Remains Aggressive In Self-Driving Vehicle Race To Market
links.description: The future of driving looks like it will be awfully different, and Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) remains committed to being a part of the transformation. Self-driving cars remain on the to do list for the tech giant, but full details of the company's plans remain under wraps.
